Well said.  People have got to remember that these films are for entertainm=
ent purposes only.  I for one can not stand Tom Cruse and it took every oun=
ce of concentration to ignore his part in the film because I was only inter=
ested in the Martial Arts techniques.  If one wants to know the true story =
of that period, pick up a book (sometimes you can't really rely on the inte=
rnet for research).  As a Civil War reenactor, I picked out several of flaw=
s but that didn't stop me from learning a thing or two about sword techinqu=
es.  By the way, I waited till that flick came out on AMC.  I refuse to was=
te any of my hard earned money on a Tom Cruse movie ~_^
   
  Phil in Norfo=
lk Virginia
